reg:regulation.reg:title:
Designation of Motorcycle
Safety Helmets Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 179/2019, July 19, 2019]

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 194 of the Motor Vehicle Act, a motorcycle safety helmet that meets at least one of the following requirements is designated as an approved motorcycle safety helmet:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: certification in accordance with the Snell Memorial Foundation 2020 Standard for Protective Headgear For Use with Motorcycles and Other Motorized Vehicles, as amended from time to time before or after the making of this regulation;

approved in accordance with the United Nations Economic Commission for Europe (ECE) ECE Regulation No. 22 â€“ Uniform provisions concerning the approval of protective helmets and of their visors for drivers and passengers of motor cycles and mopeds, as amended from time to time before or after the making of this regulation.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Motor Vehicle Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 318, ss. 194 and 210.]
